Reid's Ice Cream was a local brand, manufactured in Blue Point, Long Island.

Another Bain Agency photo of George Lawrence shows him in the back seat of an open car. What does he hold in his left hand?

comment._content: I think it's just the top of the stick he's holding in this photo.
